backend/main.mo: Main actor for the AnthroVerse backend defining all data types (User, Post, Event, Tenure, etc.), state maps, and public API endpoints with role-based access control, blob storage, and user approval mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Data migration module that upgrades the stored User type by adding `companyName` and `description` fields (defaulting to empty strings) to all existing user records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (admin panel, profile badges, role assignment, profile editing, etc.) to their corresponding frontend/backend files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted text file containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing key fixes and responsibilities for pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the AnthroVerse SPA that mounts the React app into a `#root` div and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up React Query, TanStack Router, and handles authentication phases (loading, unauthenticated, profile setup, awaiting approval, main app) before rendering the routed layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/RoleAssign: Admin panel card that lists all approved (non-root-admin) users and allows an admin to select and assign roles to each user via a dropdown and confirm button.
frontend/src/components/admin/TenureMana: Admin component for starting a new organizational tenure by selecting officers (president, vice president, secretary-treasurer) from approved users and assigning a semester period. Displays a multi-step dialog with a warning about role resets before submitting.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky top header component with a sidebar toggle button and a notification bell dropdown that fetches, displays, and marks notifications as read.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Renders the application sidebar with navigation links (Feed, Events, Chapter Growth), user profile display, role badge, and logout functionality, conditionally showing items based on user role and admin status.
Wrapper layout component for authentication pages that renders a full-screen background image with overlay, a centered logo/branding header, and a frosted-glass card container for child content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginForm.t: Login form component that triggers Internet Identity authentication via a single button, showing a loading state during login and a link to switch to the signup flow.
Two-step signup form that first connects via Internet Identity, then collects name, email, and optional profile picture to create and save a new user profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/WaitingForA: Full-screen holding page shown to users whose accounts are pending admin approval, with a button to send an approval request and an option to sign out.
frontend/src/components/chapter-growth/G: Feed component for a specific post category/group that lists posts with like, approve, and delete actions, and includes a toggleable inline post creation form.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React class component that catches runtime errors and displays a user-friendly error screen with a refresh button, showing error details in development mode.
frontend/src/components/events/CreateEve: Form component for creating a new event with fields for title, description, date/time, optional banner image upload, and an optional registration limit.
frontend/src/components/events/EventCard: Displays a single event card with banner, date, registration limit, and a register button that calls the registration mutation and shows toast feedback. Marks already-registered or past events accordingly.
frontend/src/components/feed/CreatePostF: Form component for creating a new post with content, category selection (filtered by user role), and optional image upload. Submits via the useSubmitPost mutation and resets state on success.
frontend/src/components/feed/PendingAppr: Lists all posts with pending status and provides an approve button for each, using the useApprovePost mutation. Shows a loading spinner or empty state when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Renders a full post card with author info, category badge, like/comment/delete/approve actions, and an expandable comments section with add/delete comment support.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostFilters: Provides category tab filters, a 'My Posts' toggle, and a search input for filtering the post feed by category or author name.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainLayou: Main authenticated layout wrapping all pages with a sidebar, sticky header containing role-based navigation buttons, a notification bell with unread count, and a user dropdown menu with logout.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Simple animated spinner component with configurable size (sm/md/lg) used as a loading indicator throughout the app.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Bell icon button that shows an unread count badge and toggles a NotificationPanel dropdown, marking notifications as read when opened.
Renders a single notification row with a type-specific icon, message text, formatted timestamp, and an unread indicator dot.
Renders a dropdown panel displaying a sorted list of notifications using NotificationItem components, or an empty state with a bell icon if there are none.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a single post with author info, category, like/comment interactions, and conditional admin actions (approve, delete) based on user role and ownership.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for new users to register a name and email after Internet Identity login, with special handling to detect and display a root admin account notice.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedSection: Wrapper component that conditionally renders children only if the current user's role is in the provided allowedRoles list, otherwise rendering an optional fallback.
frontend/src/components/RoleBadge.tsx: Small presentational component that renders a styled badge displaying a user's role label using utility functions for label and CSS class lookup.
frontend/src/components/WaitingForApprov: Screen shown to registered users whose accounts are pending admin approval, offering options to recheck status or log out.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks (queries and mutations) for interacting with the backend actor, covering user profiles, posts, events, comments, registrations, notifications, and admin operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Poppins and Inter fonts, defines CSS custom properties for the design system, and declares Tailwind base, component, and utility layers including badges, gradients, and glass-card styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility module exporting helper functions for class merging, role/category label formatting, badge styling, timestamp formatting, initials extraction, and role-based permission checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for managing user approvals, role assignments, and content, using mutations to approve/reject users and assign roles.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Renders either the LoginPage or a signup form based on local view state, toggling between the two with a button. Accepts an optional `showSignup` prop to default to the signup view.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterGrowthPage.tsx: Displays chapter growth analytics (total posts, user's posts, announcement count) and recent activity, restricted to users with the appropriate role via `canAccessChapterGrowth`.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterMeetingPage.ts: Shows chapter meeting details (date, time, venue, theme, etc.) and allows executive-role users to edit and save those details via a local form with toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Full events management page supporting creating, approving, registering for, and toggling payment status on events, with role-based access control for executives vs. regular members.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Community feed page with category filtering, post creation, approval of pending posts, deletion, and like toggling, with a pinned announcements section and role-based permissions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen that authenticates users via Internet Identity, displaying a branded card with a logo, description, and a login button that shows a spinner while connecting.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: A profile page component that displays and allows editing of a user's profile information (name, email, company, description, profile picture), with support for image upload progress and role-based display.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: An initial profile setup form for new users to enter their name, email, and optional profile picture before being navigated to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/WaitingApprovalPage.t: A holding page shown to users whose accounts are pending admin approval, offering options to request approval, refresh status, or log out.
frontend/src/utils/permissions.ts: Defines role-based permission helper functions (e.g., canApproveContent, canManageUsers, canCreatePost) used throughout the app to gate features by user role.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility functions for formatting BigInt nanosecond timestamps into human-readable relative time, dates, and datetimes, plus helpers for checking if a time is upcoming and converting dates to nanoseconds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH/HSL color tokens, typography fonts (Poppins, Inter), border radii, box shadows, and fade/slide animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of a web app project at version 3, listing known issues, existing features, and architectural notes focused on admin account visibility, profile editing, role management, and logout functionality.
